name: General Practitioner - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is General Practitioner Original Soundtrack by Ann Sharova. There are 11 tracks in mp3 format.

These are the track titles:

1- First Date
2- Cold Relationship
3- It wasn't me
4- Sunny Mood
5- Waiting for tonight
6- Stress Moments
7- Use your brain
8- Crew Gathering
9- Unchecked Passion
10- Worrying News
11- Tell me it's not true

Credits:
Composed by Ann Sharova

short_description: This is General Practitioner Original Soundtrack by Ann Sharova. There are 11 tracks in mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System
